title: Harissa Aioli Recipe
full_text:
Harissa Aioli Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
1 min
Total
5 mins
Serves
8
to 10 servings
Makes
1 cup
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
recipe
two-minute aioli
3
tablespoons
fresh
harissa paste
or store-bought, such as Mustapha's
Extra-virgin olive oil
, for drizzling
Directions
Combine aioli and harissa in a small bowl and stir until roughly combined. Drizzle with olive oil and serve with grilled vegetables, meats, or sandwiches. Aioli can be stored in a sealed container in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks.
